channel.title: Help! How to make owners not lose items on death?
channel.description:
Hi, Im using the soul-split source, and when i die i lose items. I need to fix this, Please help me asap.
Thanks, Robert

item.title: Help! How to make owners not lose items on death?
item.dc:creator: @thomas27 thomas27
item.description:
@thomas27 wrote:

It should be something like this:

[code]

        If p.rights = 3 {
        teleportToX = 2889;
        teleportToY = 3557;
        // pEmote = 15;
        // pWalk = 13;
        sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!");
        setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]);
        currentHealth = 99;
        hitDiff = 0;	
        updateRequired = true;
        appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

{ else
removeAllItems();
teleportToX = 2889;
teleportToY = 3557;
// pEmote = 15;
// pWalk = 13;
sendMessage(“Oh dear you are dead!”);
setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]);
currentHealth = 99;
hitDiff = 0;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Help! How to make owners not lose items on death?
